meanings.definition: Integrationists: advocates or supporters of integration
meanings.sent1: The integrationists worked together to promote unity among all people.
meanings.sent2: Many integrationists believe in the importance of bringing diverse communities together.
meanings.sent3: The integrationists threw a party to celebrate the harmony they had achieved.
meanings.sent4: She saw the integrationists as puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The integrationists' dedication to unity was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Integrationists: those who believe in the process of integrating different groups or elements into a unified whole
meanings.sent1: As integrationists, they strive to blend various ideas into a cohesive plan.
meanings.sent2: The integrationists worked tirelessly to merge the different departments into one efficient team.
meanings.sent3: The integrationists joked that mixing ingredients in the kitchen was like their daily task at work.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of society, integrationists are the gardeners carefully tending to each unique flower.
meanings.sent5: The integrationists' mission was to weave a tapestry of diversity into a beautiful whole.
